answers.answer: Dear Adelle,It is outside my area of expertise to comment on your medical situation. I am not able to forward it. However, you clearly have a number of medical concerns, and I would urge you to advocate strongly for yourself with your primary care doctor, particularly because of your diabetes which, as I'm sure you know, can result in many associated symptoms.

Dear Adelle,My apologies re: the matter of diabetes (though it probably should be investigated). Nonetheless, please follow up with your primary care physician until you reach clarity re: your condition.

question: I forgot to tell you that I can no longer get to sleep easily and that I have pretty high cholesterol.  It was 209 last spring.  Sorry for forgetting.  Adelle
title: numbness Continued
